body_html:
Better late than never :). Recent TF builds (1.8) with CUDA 9.1 has indeed fixed the issue. Depending on the batch size, I see pretty good fp16 perf. on NVidia P100 and V100 for both inference and training.
\rajiv

body:
Better late than never :).  Recent TF builds (1.8) with CUDA 9.1 has indeed fixed the issue.  Depending on the batch size, I see pretty good fp16 perf. on NVidia P100 and V100 for both inference and training.
\rajiv
